title: Multi-Agent Autonomous Orbital Maneuvering
description: Learned interception and evasion maneuver policies (MADDPG) for two adversarial satellite swarms in a simulated orbital environment using RLlib, Gym (PettingZoo), and Poliastro.

title: Medical Ultrasound Image Denoising
description: Developed computer vision models in PyTorch to denoise ultrasound scans and improve nerve structure identification in the brachial plexus.

title: Aircraft Simulator (1:1 scale)
description: Built a full-scale aircraft simulator in a Beechcraft Baron 55 cockpit. Led fundraising, developed navigation instruments, electronics, and 3D-printed parts. Managed a student team and technical budget.
